mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT surveyGroupNo,cateName,quesName,manager,surveyDate,type,answer,dissatisReason,satisVal,companyName FROM survey JOIN company ON survey.companyNo = company.companyNo ORDER BY surveyGroupNo DESC

SELECT DISTINCT surveyGroupNo,cateName,quesName,manager,surveyDate,type,answer,dissatisReason,satisVal,companyName FROM survey JOIN company ON survey.companyNo = company.companyNo WHERE survey.surveyGroupNo = #{surveyNo} ORDER BY surveyGroupNo DESC
